sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from './services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'ejemplo11-web'; constructor(public service: ApiService) { } comando = ""; Salir() { this.comando = "logout"; this.service.postEntrada(this.comando).subscribe(async (res: any) => { alert(await res.result + "\n"); }); } }
